about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Federation rank 15 engineering frigate “Octopus”
  • Active module Restoring projector
  • Special title “Sly fox” — for successfully completing missions that involve evading the pursuit of enemy ships using the manoeuvrability of “Octopus”.
  • Special ammunition against aliens — “Resonating crystal”, “Resonating charges”, “Resonating slugs” — 30 pcs.
  • Special missiles “Crystal drone” — 30 pcs.
  • Portrait “Jason Robn”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 14 days!

Do you want to own a ship built using the technology of the Aliens? Then Octopus is exactly what you need! This ship is the result of a mysterious alien integration into spaceship building technology. Take advantage of the unknown and defeat all your enemies on the battlefield! Octopus is your chance to become invincible in the galactic battles.

The full story of this ship is unknown, as its prototype was found in the cargo hold of a damaged pirate transport. Rumour has it that pirates captured several scientists studying Alien technology and forced them to create this ship.

name: Star Conflict - Octopus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This pack includesFederation rank 15 engineering frigate “Octopus”Active module Restoring projectorSpecial title “Sly fox” — for successfully completing missions that involve evading the pursuit of enemy ships using the manoeuvrability of “Octopus”.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
